title: Win a skin in 2 easy steps!
body:
Dear Summoners,

Pacific Peninsula are running ANOTHER give away.
We currently have one running here, check it out: [GIVEAWAY](https://www.facebook.com/pacific.peninsula/photos/a.558496247635823.1073741828.555275344624580/568585523293562/?type=3&comment_id=569033309915450&notif_t=photo_comment)

Our NEW give away is simple!

1. Go to our [Facebook page](http://www.facebook.com/Pacific.Peninsula)
2. Share & like the pinned post at the top of the page about our 1v1 Tournament

Now you're officially in the draw to win** 1x Mystery Skin!**

The winner will be announced tomorrow at **10PM Adelaide Time.**

Cheers,
bollockz

replies.body:
May the claus be with you.
(That was my attempt at a horrible "force" pun in christmas edition)
Hey Bollocks, a small thought came too my head, but how will the winner be announced?
